articles.author: Ledger live
articles.description:
The Start Ledger Live SSO platform is designed to simplify your entry into the world of cryptocurrency. By integrating Single Sign-On (SSO) technology, it ensures secure and convenient access to your Ledger Live account.
Simplified Login
 Enjoy one-click access to your Ledger Live account, eliminating the need to remember multiple credentials.
Robust Security
 With advanced encryption and authentication protocols, your account and digital assets remain protected at all times.
User-Friendly Experience
 The streamlined interface makes navigating your account and managing assets quick and effortless.

How to Get Started
Visit Ledger Live .
Log in using your SSO credentials.
Begin exploring Ledger Live, manage your portfolio, and monitor your crypto assets with ease.

Why Choose Ledger Live SSO?
With its focus on security and simplicity, the Ledger Live is perfect for users who value efficiency without compromising on safety. Whether you‚Äôre trading, investing, or simply keeping track of your assets, this tool ensures a seamless experience.
Unlock the future of secure crypto management today!
articles.title: Get Started with Ledger Live: Seamless Access with SSO

articles.author: Pankaj Singh
articles.description:
2025 is the year AI coding has taken off transforming how developers work and it will not stop here, we will experience something great in the coming future!
If you're a developer and you're not using AI tools, you're already falling behind. From boosting productivity to eliminating grunt work, AI coding assistants are now a core part of engineering teams.
JPMorgan reports its AI coding assistant has boosted engineer productivity by 10‚Äì20‚ÄØ% (intrguing,right?)


Goldman Sachs says developers using its in-house Copilot saw up to 20‚ÄØ% efficiency gains‚Äîas CEO David Solomon calls it, ‚Äúa huge tailwind‚Äù.


Bangalore-based developers are now coding up to 30‚ÄØ% faster thanks to AI tools handling code, QA, docs, and mentoring.



‚Ä¶And more companies amped up their productivity using AI coding assista‚Ä¶
articles.title: 10+ AI Code Tools To Become Expert Developer in 2025

articles.author: buiapp
articles.description:
As Python-based UI frameworks gain popularity, more developers are turning to tools like NiceGUI for building web interfaces with pure Python. However, with the convenience of these frameworks comes a familiar challenge: managing state synchronization between your backend logic and frontend UI components. This challenge becomes particularly pronounced as applications grow in complexity.
If you've built applications with NiceGUI (or similar frameworks with a Python backend and browser frontend), you've likely encountered the following scenario:
A user interacts with a UI component (like checking a todo item)
This triggers an event handler in your Python code
Your code updates some internal state (the todo item's completed status)
You manually update other dependent UI components (task count‚Ä¶
articles.title: Mastering State Synchronization in NiceGUI Applications: A Reactive Approach

articles.author: niotech one
articles.description:
ASP.NET Core is a powerful, open-source web framework developed by Microsoft. It is a modern, high-performance alternative to the older ASP.NET framework and is designed to support the evolving needs of developers creating cloud-based, cross-platform, and scalable web applications.
Since its introduction, ASP.NET Core has rapidly become a popular choice among developers thanks to its modular design, improved performance, and full support for modern development practices such as microservices, containerization, and DevOps.
What Is ASP.NET Core?
ASP.NET Core is a cross-platform, open-source framework used to build web applications, RESTful APIs, and microservices. Unlike its predecessor, ASP.NET Core is designed to run on multiple operating systems, including Windows, macOS, and Linux.
It is‚Ä¶
articles.title: Understanding ASP.NET Core: The Future of Web Development with .NET

articles.author: Anson Ch
articles.description:
Building a PDF Viewer in Vue.js sounds simple‚Äîuntil you try integrating one into a real-world project. Based on my experience, when deciding whether to build or choose a PDF Viewer, there are 3 fundamentals to consider:
PDF Viewing: Loading PDF files of various types and sizes should be smooth.


Default Toolbar: Basic functions such as search, zoom, page navigation and download should be readily available


Print Preview: Depending on where the viewer is rendered, print results may not work as expected.



Although there are a few open-source libraries PDF Viewer for Vue like @tato30/vue-pdf or vue-pdf-embed, unless you are looking for a simple PDF renderer, these solutions may not be sufficient.
üëâ Want a Vue-first, production-ready PDF viewer? Try Vue PDF Viewer and skip the duct tape.
‚Ä¶
articles.title: üî• 3 Common Problems When Building a PDF Viewer in Vue.js (And How to Actually Fix Them)

articles.author: Khushii
articles.description: The Python Standard Library is a powerful collection of pre-installed modules and packages that provide essential tools for everyday programming tasks. It supports file handling, regular expressions, JSON manipulation, threading, networking, and even web development ‚Äî all without the need for external libraries. Whether you‚Äôre building APIs, automating workflows, or working with data structures, the standard library offers a reliable and efficient foundation. It‚Äôs one of the key reasons why Python remains a top choice in trending fields like machine learning, data science, and automation. Ideal for beginners and pros alike, the standard library boosts productivity and accelerates development in real-world applications.
articles.title: What is the Python Standard Library?

articles.author: Flavio Conca
articles.description:
Em 2024, apenas 13% das empresas brasileiras aplicaram IA em seus projetos¬π internos ou como produtos e solu√ß√µes.
O problema n√£o √© infraestrutura.
Recentemente vi aqui uma empresa com vaga aberta de Dev Full Stack Ai/Ml e isso me fez pensar que o maior gargalo brasileiro na ado√ß√£o de IA hoje n√£o √© tecnologia, √© a falta de talentos prontos.
Enquanto alguns compram licen√ßa software caro para apresentar no board ou terceirizam projetos inteiros para consultorias gringas, o que falta mesmo s√£o profissionais com capacidade real de conhecer, construir, escalar, gerenciar e sustentar IA dentro das empresas.
O d√©ficit de profissionais em tech e IA j√° ultrapassa meio milh√£o de vagas n√£o preenchidas. Mas esse d√©ficit n√£o √© de profissionais generalistas, dos estudantes e entrantes de n√≠vel JR. 
O mercado precisa de gente em n√≠veis de qualifica√ß√£o, de especialistas para suprir demandas t√©cnicas, de gente que conhe√ßa  n√£o s√≥ qual framework utilizar, mas que siaba de neg√≥cios, que saiba prever e escalar um projeto. Gente para decis√µes.
As empresas precisam urgentemente criar n√∫cleos internos e experimentais debru√ßados sobre solu√ß√µes de IA, buscar solu√ß√µes open-source - que s√£o in√∫meras, criar no m√≠nimo seus pr√≥prios servidores internos com documenta√ß√µes organizadas para extrair dados, ter seu RAG cl√°ssico e saber organizar informa√ß√µes de seus relat√≥rios para transformar suas decis√µes.
Isso que seria o b√°sico para a inova√ß√£o e transforma√ß√£o atrav√©s do uso pr√°tico da IA como ferramenta n√£o √© realidade ainda para a maioria das empresas brasileiras.
Hoje, o cen√°rio do mercado geral est√° dividido em 3 grupos:
Quem j√° tem sua m√°quina interna de IA.
Quem recorre ao outsourcing t√©cnico.
Quem ainda est√° debatendo se "vale a pena" ou se o "ChatGPT" vai ajudar a criar una planilha ou escrever um e-mail.
Os dois primeiros crescem.


IA n√£o √© um projeto. 
A √∫nica pergunta que importa agora n√£o √© mais "quando adotar IA" ou "Qual escolher".

Como escalar IA pata solu√ß√µes reais mesmo sem profissionais prontos?

Abranet
